## Ranges

The first two characters of the CCN represent the state in which the provider or
supplier is located. 

```{r}
#| label: medicare-ranges
#| echo: false
#| message: false
ccn::medicare_ranges |>
  collapse::fgroup_by(abbr) |> 
  collapse::fsummarise(desc = toString(desc), range = toString(range)) |> 
  gt::gt() |> 
  gt::tab_options(quarto.disable_processing = TRUE) |> 
  gtExtras::gt_theme_nytimes() |> 
  gt::tab_style(
    style = gt::cell_text(
      font = gt::google_font(name = "JetBrains Mono"), color = "grey60", size = "small"), 
    locations = gt::cells_body(columns = range)) |> 
  gt::tab_style(
    style = gt::cell_text(weight = "bold"), 
    locations = gt::cells_body(columns = abbr)) |> 
  gt::tab_style(
    style = gt::cell_text(color = "grey50", size = "small"), 
    locations = gt::cells_body(columns = desc))
```
